mapper.select: SELECT * FROM projects ORDER BY create_time DESC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO projects ( name, creator_id, status, description, image_url, channel_id, category, deadline, tags, create_time, update_time ) VALUES ( #{name}, #{creatorId}, #{status}, #{description}, #{imageUrl}, #{channelId}, #{category}, #{deadline}, #{tags}, NOW(), NOW() )
mapper.update: UPDATE projects SET name = #{name}, description = #{description}, category = #{category}, image_url = #{imageUrl}, channel_id = #{channelId}, tags = #{tags}, status = #{status}, update_time = now() WHERE id = #{id}
UPDATE projects SET status = 0, update_time = now() WHERE id = #{id}
